<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Limited">[Demolitionist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=118)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 133 <sup>2.0</sup>

As rippling explosions bring a castle's walls tumbling down, you grin and wipe the stone dust of your handiwork from your face. Brute force might work for others, but applying science to place the right explosives in just the right spot is essential to your craft.

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="3">Additional Feats</title>

This archetype has some feats at a level other than their original level.
Such feats are marked with a \*.

[Click here for the full rules on Additional Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1432).
